actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to impose an excise tax on fuels containing sulphur and on certain emissions of sulphur oxides.

summary.text: Imposes an excise tax under the Internal Revenue Code on fuels containing sulphur and on emissions of sulphur oxides from a stationary source into the atmosphere. Exempts the excise tax upon fuels sold to a manufacturer, producer, or importer for resale by him. (Adds 26 U.S.C. 4111-13, 4496-98)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to impose an excise tax on fuels containing sulphur and on certain emissions of sulphur oxides.
